name.en: Foresight into industrial innovation and value creation seminar
name.ch: 前瞻產業創新創價講座

notice.ch:
1.對前瞻產業有興趣的同學，歡迎修習本課程。
2.授課教師：馬堅勇老師

remark.ch:
1.對前瞻產業有興趣的同學，歡迎修習本課程。
2.授課教師：馬堅勇老師

goal.ch:
台灣極度缺乏資源，而經濟高度的依賴出口導向，因此產業發展必需以「創新」與「創價」為核心。此外，台灣整體經濟的成長，更需要以前瞻產業為藍本，才能有持續的國際競爭力。以此思為為架構，本課程定名為「前瞻產業創新創價講座」。

本課程包含以下主要內容：
1、以五項前瞻產業為課程核心：材料、精密機械、半導體、新能源及AI；
2、前瞻產業策略擬定、執行及發展；
3、五項前瞻產業代表性公司的管理、營運與發展；
4、企業危機管控、處理及韌性強化；
5、循環經濟、節能減碳及ESG。

本課程的預期效益為：
1、台灣五項前瞻產業未來發展的深度學習；
2、廣度了解五項前瞻產業代表性公司的策略、營運與發展；
3、以個案分析了解企業危機處理、管控機制及韌性強化作法；
4、掌握循環經濟、節能減碳及ESG的前瞻產業動態及趨勢；
5、廣度學習前瞻產業永續發展及核心競爭力的建立。

本課程講座的設計與教授，將為企管系同學開啟台灣五項前瞻產業的視窗，更以「創業」、「創新」、「創價」為核心，為台灣作育新一代的優質管理人才。.

台灣極度缺乏資源，而經濟高度的依賴出口導向，因此產業發展必需以「創新」與「創價」為核心。此外，台灣整體經濟的成長，更需要以前瞻產業為藍本，才能有持續的國際競爭力。以此思為為架構，本課程定名為「前瞻產業創新創價講座」。

本課程講座的設計與教授，將為企管系同學開啟台灣五項前瞻產業的視窗，更以「創業」、「創新」、「創價」為核心，為台灣作育新一代的優質管理人才。.
Foresight Industry Innovation and Value Creation Seminar

Taiwan faces a severe scarcity of resources and has an economy highly dependent on export orientation. Therefore, industrial development must focus on “innovation“ and “value creation“ as its core. Additionally, to ensure sustained international competitiveness, Taiwan’s economic growth must be grounded in foresight industries. Based on this concept, this course is titled “Foresight Industry Innovation and Value Creation Lecture.“

The main content of this course includes:

1. Focusing on five foresight industries: materials, precision machinery, semiconductors, new energy, and AI.
2. Developing, executing, and evolving strategies for foresight industries.
3. Management, operations, and development of representative companies within these five foresight industries.
4. Corporate crisis management, response, and resilience enhancement.
5. Circular economy, energy conservation, carbon reduction, and ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance).

Expected Benefits of the Course:

1. In-depth learning on the future development of Taiwan’s five foresight industries.
2. Broad understanding of the strategies, operations, and development of representative companies in these five foresight industries.
3. Case-based analysis to understand corporate crisis management, control mechanisms, and resilience enhancement practices.
4. Grasping the trends and dynamics of foresight industries in circular economy, energy conservation, carbon reduction, and ESG.
5. Extensive learning on sustainable development and the establishment of core competitiveness in foresight industries.

The design and teaching of this lecture course will open a window into Taiwan‘s five foresight industries for business management students, focusing on “start a business“, “innovation“ and “value creation“ to nurture a new generation of high-quality management talent for Taiwan.

outline.ch:
1 ( / ) 從台灣前瞻產業整體發展剖析關鍵材料創新與創價--合一特用材料股份有限公司董事長馬堅勇
2 ( / ) 德國百年材料公司與時俱進的發展與創新--台灣默克股份有限公司處長林繼勇
3 ( / ) 資源有限, 循環無限 : 循環經濟與材料綠色再生--佳龍科技工程股份有限公司董事長吳界欣
4 ( / ) 半導體先進封裝CoWoS設備的自主創新及策略發展--志聖工業股份有限公司總經理梁又文
5 ( / ) 高端工具機發展的全球佈局與發展--友嘉實業股份有限公司董事長朱志洋
6 ( / ) 先進半導體設備用電源供應模組的研發與應用--明遠精密股份有限公司董事長寇崇善
7 ( / ) 精密滾動體在先進傳動設備的發展與應用--天工精密股份有限公司總經理林筱婷
8 ( / ) 從循環經濟的落實提升半導體用晶圓製造的價值創新--環球晶圓股份有限公司副總經理黃耀毅
9 ( / ) 先進半導體封裝材料與製程發展的創價作為--台灣千住電子股份有限公司台灣副總經理黃智堯
10 ( / ) 高階半導體設備用精密耗材的創新研發與創價--台灣精材股份有限公司總經理王元星
11 ( / ) 半導體濺射薄膜即時分析創新技術及創價商模--見微科技股份有限公司董事長羅尚賢
12 ( / ) 3D 微型列印技術在精密醫療及機械元件的發展與應用--丹麥mycro 3D公司創辦人張天仁
13 ( / ) 台積電節能減碳的創新思維與具體作為--台灣積體電路製造公司處長童國倫
14 ( / ) 全球氫能前瞻產業發展的核心議題 - 安全與回收再利用--鼎佳能源股份有限公司董事長閻明宇
15 ( / ) 台灣前瞻產業發展不可或缺的能源選項 - 燃料電池--Bloom Energy Corp. VP Asia Pacific Adam Bacon
16 ( / ) 從製造根留台灣建構AI在半導體產業全球佈局的作為--杰倫智能科技股份有限公司執行長黃建豪
17 ( / ) 科技創投從前瞻產業的整合加速創業與創價--集誠資本台灣股份有限公司董事長陳耀金
18 ( / ) 前瞻產業創業、創新、創價與永續發展--合一特用材料股份有限公司董事長馬堅勇
outline.en:
1 ( / ) Analyzing Key Material Innovation and Value Creation through the Development of Taiwan‘s Emerging Industries--Openness Specialty Materials Corp. Ltd.Chairman Chien-Yung Ma
2 ( / ) Innovation and Progress in the Development of a Century-Old German Materials Company--Merck KGaA (Germany)Director Lin Ji-Yong
3 ( / ) Limited Resources, Unlimited Recycling: Circular Economy and Green Material Regeneration--Super Dragon Technology Co., Ltd.Chairman Wu Jie-Xin
4 ( / ) Independent Innovation and Strategic Development of Advanced Semiconductor Packaging CoWoS Equipment--C SUN MFG LTD.General Manager Liang You-Wen
5 ( / ) Global Layout and Development of High-End Machine Tools--FAIR FRIEND ENTERPRISE CO., LTD.Chairman Chu Chih-Yang
6 ( / ) R＆D and Application of Power Supply Modules for Advanced Semiconductor Equipment--Finesse Technology Co., Ltd.Chairman Kou Chong-Shan
7 ( / ) Development and Application of Precision Rolling Elements in Advanced Transmission Equipment--TAN KONG PRECISION TECH CO., LTD.General Manager Lin Hsiao-Ting
8 ( / ) Enhancing Value Innovation in Semiconductor Wafer Manufacturing through Circular Economy Implementation--GlobalWafers Co., Ltd.Deputy General Manager Huang Yao-Yi
9 ( / ) Value-Creation Strategies in the Development of Advanced Semiconductor Packaging Materials and Processes--SENJU METAL INDUSTRY CO., LTD.Taiwan Deputy General Manager Huang Chih-Yao
10 ( / ) Innovative R＆D and Value Creation for Precision Consumables in Advanced Semiconductor Equipment--Forcera Materials Co., Ltd.General Manager Wang Yuan-Hsing
11 ( / ) Innovative Technology and Business Models for Real-Time Analysis of Semiconductor Sputtering Films--UCSM Technology Corp.Chairman Lo Shang-Hsien
12 ( / )Development and Application of 3D Microprinting Technology in Precision Medical Devices and Mechanical Components--Denmark mycro 3D Company Founder Chang Tien-Jen
13 ( / ) TSMC‘s Innovative Thinking and Practical Actions in Energy Saving and Carbon Reduction--TSMC, Director Tung Kuo-Lun
14 ( / ) Core Issues in the Global Development of the Hydrogen Energy Industry: Safety and Recycling--Toplus Energy Corp.Chairman Yen Ming-Yu
15 ( / ) Fuel Cells: An Indispensable Energy Option for Taiwan‘s Emerging Industry Development--Bloom Energy Corp. VP Asia Pacific Adam Bacon
16 ( / ) Building a Global AI Semiconductor Industry Layout through Taiwan-Based Manufacturing--PROFET AI TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.CEO Huang Chien-Hao
17 ( / ) Accelerating Entrepreneurship and Value Creation through Venture Capital Integration in Emerging Industries--JC Capital Taiwan Co., Ltd.Chairman Chen Yao-Chin
18 ( / ) Entrepreneurship, Innovation, Value Creation, and Sustainable Development in Emerging Industries--Openness Specialty Materials Corp. Ltd.Chairman Chien-Yung Ma
